casebody.data:
Carl Edward LYONS
v.
NORTH CAROLINA COURT OF APPEALS. No. 99P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Carl Edward Lyons, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 22nd day of July 2004 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
